In his segment called "The Ugly Truth," chauvinistic 
morning show commentator Mike Alexander (Gerard Butler) 
makes his perpetually single producer (Katherine Heigl) 
the subject of a series of romantic tests in order to 
prove his theories on relationships. But will his 
experiments help her find love, or is she just a hopeless 
case? Cheryl Hines co-stars as Mike's unflappable co-anchor 
in this rom-com from the team behind Legally Blonde.

Starring: Gerard Butler, Katherine Heigl

Director: Robert Luketic
